(METON panel rögzítő)
(cmd line: -i meton_panel_rogzito.txt -t)
(szerszám beállítás)

t1 m d2 h19

yxz
t1
s50
f700

safetop0.20
safebottom0.10
overcut0.300

pre_mill_steps2

#max meredekség polikarbonát 0.05/100mm
emax0.0125

fmax900
fmin700
fratio0.7

z1 = 2
c1 = 0.025
c2 = 0.035 #furatok
c3 = 0.050 #vonalak
c4 = 0.075 #vonalak
c5 = 0.150 #keret

gw = 0.6
gh = 0.4

o1=div($t1d,2)
offset$o1,$o1,0

(1)
ph = 2.5
th = 2 # tartó horony távolsága az alaplaptól

wb = 86
w = sum($wb,3,3)

y11 = sum($ph,$th,2)

wb2 = div($wb,2)

w2 = div($w,2)



(patent)
x10 = 21
wp = 2.5
wp0 = add($wp,2)
wp2 = div($wp0,2)
xp1 = sub($x10,$wp2)
xp2 = add($x10,$wp2)
print "xp1: $xp1"
print "xp2: $xp2"

wr = 3.2
wr0 = add($wr,2)
wr2 = div($wr0,2)
xr1 = sub($x10,$wr2)
xr2 = add($x10,$wr2)
print "xr1: $xr1"
print "xr2: $xr2"

(bevágás a patent széléig)
xp11 = add($xr1, .3)
xp12 = sub($xr2, .3)
(alsó_1)
l 0,$ph $xp11,$ph z$z1 c$c4 g1,$gw,$gh ns

ph11 = sub($ph,0.3)
ph12 = add($ph,0.3)
l $xp11,$ph11 $xp11,$ph12 z$z1 c$c4 ns no_comp

ph2 = sub($ph, 0.5)
ph3 = sub($ph, 3.0)
ph4 = sub($ph, 3.5)

(patent oldalai)
l $xp1,$ph3 $xr1,$ph2 z$z1 c$c2 ns
l $xp2,$ph3 $xr2,$ph2 z$z1 c$c2 ns

(patent alja)
l $xp1,$ph4 $xp2,$ph4 z$z1 c$c4 ns no_comp

xu = $xp12

(patent)
x10 = 71
wp = 2.5
wp0 = add($wp,2)
wp2 = div($wp0,2)
xp1 = sub($x10,$wp2)
xp2 = add($x10,$wp2)
print "xp1: $xp1"
print "xp2: $xp2"

wr = 3.2
wr0 = add($wr,2)
wr2 = div($wr0,2)
xr1 = sub($x10,$wr2)
xr2 = add($x10,$wr2)
print "xr1: $xr1"
print "xr2: $xr2"

(bevágás a patent széléig)
xp11 = add($xr1, .3)
xp12 = sub($xr2, .3)

#ph11 = sub($ph,0.2)
#ph12 = add($ph,0.2)
l $xu,$ph $xp11,$ph z$z1 c$c4 ns g1,$gw,$gh
l $xu,$ph11 $xu,$ph12 z$z1 c$c4 ns no_comp
l $xp11,$ph11 $xp11,$ph12 z$z1 c$c4 ns no_comp

l $xp12,$ph $w,$ph z$z1 c$c4 ns g1,$gw,$gh
l $xp12,$ph11 $xp12,$ph12 z$z1 c$c4 ns no_comp

ph2 = sub($ph, 0.5)
ph3 = sub($ph, 3.0)
ph4 = sub($ph, 3.5)

(patent oldalai)
l $xp1,$ph3 $xr1,$ph2 z$z1 c$c2 ns
l $xp2,$ph3 $xr2,$ph2 z$z1 c$c2 ns

(patent alja)
l $xp1,$ph4 $xp2,$ph4 z$z1 c$c4 ns no_comp


(tartó horony)
x11 = add($w2,$wb2)
x12 = sub($w2,$wb2)
l $x11,$y11 $x12,$y11 z$z1 c$c3 ns


(keret)
h = sum($th,2,10)
b outline 0,$ph size$w,$h z$z1 c$c5 ns g3,$gw,$gh r0 rj2 nl1,1,1,0
